title: For Waterfront Homeowners, Moving Can Have a Different Meaning
description: Beach erosion and the frequent occurrence of high tides and strong storms are causing some owners to contemplate lifting or moving as added protection.
dc:creator: Ellen Rosen
media:credit: Philip Keith for The New York Times
media:description: The home of Thomas and Kathleen Dennis in Truro, Mass., part of the Cape Cod National Seashore. The couple has had to move the house twice as the sand dunes near it erode.
